Poutine
Poutine is a beautiful main dish, snack, or side dish from Canada. It's so popular in Canada that it even got its place in Mcdonald's. It's made of three components: fries, cheese and gravy.

Bicycle mounted officers in Canada respond to the same types of calls as their motorized counterparts. They have the advantage of arriving at the scene of an incident undetected, and are often able to catch criminal occurrences in progress. In addition to this, they are expected to patrol areas that are inaccessible to cars.

Pumpkin Spice flavour....Ever since Starbucks introduced the pumpkin spice latte (or PSL) in 2003, the craze has been on a meteoric rise. In just the last five years, pumpkin spice product sales have increased about 47%, reaching $236 million in the 2021-22 season alone.
